name: Necromanso
description:
So the time has come for you, the laziest necromancer in existence, to move your ass and take control of all of your fallen enemies. In this 8 bit platformer you are Necromanso. Well, not all the time. You can spend your health to summon those who will fight for you. Yes, it pays off! You have your favourites, and things might get a little dramatic when you summon the creature that is most of your liking.

Controls:

  • Move
    • Arrow keys
  • Jump
    • Space (keyboard) / A (gamepad)
  • Summon (as necromanso) / Attack (as summoned unit)
    • X (keyboard or gamepad)
  • Suicide (as summoned unit)
    • C (keyboard) / Y (gamepad)

* Made in two days for Mini Jam 109: Depth(s). Jam's version available for download (windows only).
